CHAT.comment: I Love you and come over. maybE we can come over to see you. we missieou. Chi love (five hearts are drawn at the bottom)

Chi decides to write to his auntie Rose but doesn't write that down. Chi knows what he wants to write right away. Mot helps later with what to say. Mot helps with spelling and tries to get Chi to leave more space between words. Mot get impatient at the end when Chi starts drawing hearts on the letter

u.a: aft writes quietly for awhile: I love you . Then he starts writing and but Mot thinks he's writing auntie
looks at Mot as she tells him each letter
reading what he's done so far
I think she's trying to get him to start the new sentence on a new line
actually he's written mayb at this point
writes something , it looks like a capital I
writing up a storm by the sound of it
started to write a w instead of a v in over ?
wrestles with Chi over control of pen . He wins
slowly and forcefully , but not loud .
writes Chi Love in big letters
says shortened form of his name but has written the full name
but Chi gets the clipboard anyway .
